components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Sudani One Network in Sudan

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Sudani One network in Sudan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Our Engineers are Investigating an Issue with Call Failures

incident_updates.body: Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with voice calls got blocked. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: This incident causing SMS delivery delays to Zain Network in Sudan was prematurely resolved in one of our previous posts. Please refer to https://status.twilio.com/incidents/sx6v76zcrjch for previous updates. We continue to observe SMS delivery delays to Zain Network in Sudan. Our next update will be provided in 1 hour. We apologize for the inconvenience and for any confusion this may have caused.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 24 April 2023 at 14:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS from US handsets to a subset of US shortcodes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: The Megafon network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 24 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Megafon Russia handsets.

The Verizon network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 April 2023 at 13:00 PST until 24 April 2023 at 15:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from Verizon handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: The BT network in UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 April 2023 at 13:50 PDT until 24 April 2023 at 23:06 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from BT UK handsets

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Volna Mobile

incident_updates.body: The Volna Mobile network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 April 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 24 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Volna Mobile Russia handsets.

The BT network in UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 April 2023 at 14:15 PDT until 24 April 2023 at 19:05 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from BT UK handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: France SMS Carrier Maintenance - Bouygues Telecom

incident_updates.body: The Bouygues Telecom network in France is conducting an emergency maintenance from 24 April 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 24 April 2023 at 21:00 PST, During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from France Bouygues Telecom handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Costa Rica SMS Carrier Maintenance - ICE

incident_updates.body: The ICE network in Costa Rica is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 April 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 25 April 2023 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from ICE Costa Rica handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 April 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 28 April 2023 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via a Subset of Long codes.

During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects for calls to a subset of Twilio Czech Republic phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Service Partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 April 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 26 April 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destination: Canada
Impacted Products: Silent Network Authentication (SNA), Lookup SIM Swap, Identity Match

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 April 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 26 April 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During this maintenance window, customers will not be able to add/delete senders or delete a messaging service. Please avoid adding or removing senders or deleting messaging services during this maintenance period. Messages sent with existing messaging services configuration will still function normally.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Guyana Tunisia Iraq SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Guyana, Tunisia, and Iraq is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 April 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 26 April 2023 at 12:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Digicel – Guyana, Tunisia Telecom – Tunisia and Asia Cell – Iraq handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Latvia SMS Carrier Maintenance - LMT GSM

scheduled_maintenances.name: France Voice and SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice and SMS carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 May 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 09 May 2023 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects to a subset of Twilio France phone numbers and delays delivering SMS to and from France handsets via a Subset of Long codes.

Our Voice carrier partner in the Singapore is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 May 2023 at 10:00 PDT until 09 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects for calls to a subset of Twilio Singapore phone numbers.

Our SMS carrier partner in the UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 June 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 12 June 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from UK handsets.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 26 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 03 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT
05 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 05 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT
10 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 10 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT
12 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 12 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT
17 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 17 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT
19 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 19 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT
